title: E.ON announces acquisition of 49% stake in Midlands-based solar PV provider
lead: Eco2Solar has installed panels on thousands of new homes and commercial buildings across the UK

title: Almost nine-in-ten Germans support ‘greater use of renewable energy’
lead: More than half of German citizens believe that greater use of renewables could strengthen the regional economy, according to a new survey

title: Consortium secures €5m grant for offshore hydrogen production project
lead: The OYSTER project aims to explore the potential of hydrogen production from offshore wind at a cost that is competitive with natural gas

title: Almost 60% of Brits look at 2021 as a ‘pivotal year’ for building a greener future
lead: Nearly 67% of the public think the planet is in a worse shape than it has ever been and that the world needs to act within the next 12 months, according to a new study

title: Banks ‘are silently and indiscriminately financing a toxic tide of plastic pollution’
lead: Portfolio Earth claims financiers are ‘co-responsible’ for propping up the plastic packaging industry, one of the main contributors to harmful plastic waste

title: Government shows green spirit with £10m dram of funding for distillery industry
lead: The move aims to help businesses switch to low carbon fuels such as hydrogen, biomass, geothermal power and repurposed waste

title: Volker Beckers appointed to Igloo Energy board as Non-Exec Chairman
lead: He will advise on Igloo Energy’s strategy as the challenger brand plans rapid and sustainable growth

title: Billion-dollar natural disasters: Natural catastrophes in 2020 ‘create global economic loss of $210bn’
lead: A new study shows six-in-ten of the costliest natural catastrophes during 2020 occurred in the US

title: ‘Nearly 48% of banking customers would cash out if they knew their bank was funding fossil fuels’
lead: Seven-in-ten customers would choose a bank with a positive social and environmental impacts, according to a new report

title: South Korean SK Group invests $1.5bn in US hydrogen fuel cell manufacturer Plug Power
lead: SK Group will take a 9.9% stake in Plug Power and together they will form a joint venture to promote hydrogen fuel cell products in Asian markets
